display_long_description:
Immerse yourself in a ground-breaking augmented reality adventure with Dimensional Defender, crafted exclusively for the Quest 3. Transform your surroundings into a battleground where dragons and beings from other dimensions invade your space. Set up your play area by adding walls, floor, and ceiling height for an accurate and immersive AR experience. 

Armed with a magical wand, you must defend your realm across over 50 exciting levels.

Unleash your inner sorcerer with 21 unique spells, each offering distinct powers to aid you in your quest. Choose and upgrade from 11 different wands, each with its own special attributes, to tailor your defence strategy. Navigate through intricate maze levels that challenge your dexterity and problem-solving skills as you guide a ball to safety.

Enhance your gameplay with summoning potions, calling forth powerful allies to assist you in battle. Conquer bonus levels to earn extra gold and unlock additional upgrades and items. With a blend of action, strategy, and puzzle-solving, Dimensional Defender offers a dynamic and immersive AR experience.

Join the adventure and prove your worth as the ultimate Dimensional Defender. Your room is your battlefield. Are you ready to defend it?
